page.title: 18The Yacht Basin.
page.content: The yacht basin or marina is one of the three principal features in the block. It covers an area of approximately a quarter of a square kilometre. It has, up to the present time, had six piers constructed where boats are moored. Some of them are almost permanently occupied by people who have nowhere else to live. Electricity and water are laid on. Large areas are available for boat repairs and maintenance, and also for boat storage in the wintertime. There is a ship's chandlery on the premises, and boats are also bought and sold.
